text:
The <javadoc - Tag is closed with /> before it is over.
Here's the patch:


$ diff -u build.xml.original build.xml
--- build.xml.original	Sat Mar 23 22:55:42 2002
+++ build.xml	Sat Mar 23 22:55:59 2002
@@ -297,7 +297,7 @@
     <mkdir          dir="${dist.home}/docs/api"/>
     <javadoc sourcepath="src"
                 destdir="${dist.home}/docs/api"
-           packagenames="*"/>
+           packagenames="*">
       <classpath refid="compile.classpath"/>
     </javadoc>
creator: andreas.krueger@online.life.de

text: This was fixed some time ago. The fix will be in 4.0.4.
creator: remm@apache.org
